description: This file defines a DeviceService class providing a set of methods to interact with device-related API endpoints, including CRUD operations, connection management, capability fetching, and import/export functionalities.

classes.name: DeviceService
classes.description: A class encapsulating methods for device management and API interaction.

methods.name: getDevices
methods.description: Retrieve a paginated list of devices with optional search filter.

methods.name: getDevice
methods.description: Retrieve details of a specific device by ID.

methods.name: createDevice
methods.description: Create a new device with given data.

methods.name: updateDevice
methods.description: Update an existing device identified by ID.

methods.name: deleteDevice
methods.description: Delete a device by ID.

methods.name: testConnection
methods.description: Test connection to a device.

methods.name: connectDevice
methods.description: Establish a connection to a device.

methods.name: disconnectDevice
methods.description: Disconnect from a device.

methods.name: getDeviceCapabilities
methods.description: Retrieve capabilities of a device.

methods.name: getDeviceYangModels
methods.description: Get YANG models supported by a device.

methods.name: fetchYangModels
methods.description: Fetch YANG models from a device.

methods.name: updateCredentials
methods.description: Update credentials for a device.

methods.name: getDevicesByVendor
methods.description: Retrieve devices filtered by vendor.

methods.name: getDevicesByProtocol
methods.description: Retrieve devices filtered by protocol.

methods.name: getConnectedDevices
methods.description: List currently connected devices.

methods.name: getDeviceStatus
methods.description: Get the current status of a device.

methods.name: bulkConnect
methods.description: Connect multiple devices simultaneously.

methods.name: bulkDisconnect
methods.description: Disconnect multiple devices simultaneously.

methods.name: exportDevices
methods.description: Export device configurations, optionally for specific device IDs.

methods.name: importDevices
methods.description: Import device configurations from a file.
